name: screen-capture
description: Сервис записи экрана, трансляции и видеозвонков

scripts.prestart: npm run build && npm run build:server
scripts.dev: npm run build:server && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node server/dist/server.js
scripts.prod: npm run build:server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node server/dist/server.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:client: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run lint
scripts.build:client: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
